fields.name: Notes
fields.value:
Deals 50 damage and moves sporadically.
Immune to damage and freeze. Vulnerable to Pentagram, Rosary, and Carts.
Can drop a chest with evolution

fields.name: Dairy Plant
fields.value:
Spawns in Dairy Plant and stalks the player for 2 minutes. Chances:
1% at minute 0
30% at 8 minutes
30% at 12 minutes

fields.name: The Bone Zone
fields.value: Spawns in The Bone Zone and stalks the player for 1 minute at 10 minutes

fields.name: Luck
fields.value:
In the Dairy Plant, chances of stalker spawning are decreased by the player's luck:
Base Spawn / Luck
